Certified
Commercial
Heat Treating

Quality is Expected, Delivery is Guaranteed.

IMT Duncan is a privately owned commercial heat treater and brazer located in the Greenville-Spartanburg area of upstate South Carolina. Serving customers across the US, we heat treat and braze parts for the automotive, heavy equipment and consumer markets. Our experience, state-of-the-art technology, and commitment to high quality metallurgical heat treating and delivery set us apart in the industry.

  • ISO 9001 Certified and CQI-9 Compliant
  • Member of MTI Metal Treaters Institute
Full
Service
Heat Treating

Services

  • Endothermic Atmosphere Heat Treating
  • Exothermic Atmosphere Brazing and Annealing
  • Aluminum Heat Treating
  • Straightening
  • Cleaning
  • Carburizing
  • Carbonitriding
  • Copper Brazing
  • Neutral and Case Hardening
  • Normalizing
  • Stress Relieving
  • Metallurgical Laboratory and Inspection

Quality Heat Treating on Your Schedule

IMT Duncan excels in the heat treating market by delivering high metallurgical integrity and capability and superb on-time service. Our technical expertise, state-of-the art heat treating equipment, and discipline provide consistent, high performing heat treated products that are ready when your industry needs them.
